page.title: 16My Granny
page.content: My name is Paul Woodbridge. My Granny lives next door to me. She lives in a very old house. When my Mum goes to work my Granny looks after me. My Granny makes great toad in the hole. She is always in the garden planting flowers. My Granny goes to church every Sunday, and Saturday she goes shopping. Sometimes my Granny buys me sweets. She has got a lovely garden full of flowers. Once she took my brother and me to a play, it was about Robinson Crusoe, it was very good. We bought some raffle tivkets but we did not win.
